name: Quake II: Sewer Jam Volume 1
summary: Sewer levels are notoriously hard to get right. That’s why Andrew Yoder set out to challenge the Quake community to come up with good sewer levels all the way back in 2019. We wanted to do the same for the Quake 2 Remaster and that resulted in this package. Featuring nine new maps, a hub level and pre-rendered cutscenes. We hope you enjoy Map-Center’s Quake 2 Sewer Jam Volume 1.
